page.title: 14RECREATION AND HOBBIES
page.content: The children of St.Patrick's School, Thornaby, have many hobbies and interests,including Brownies, Guides, Boys Brigade, ballet, tap-dancing, sports, collecting postcards or stamps, brass band, knitting club, disco, break-dancing, gymnastics, judo, and iceskating. Mums and dads have a staggering number of hobbies,including all sports, music-making, gardening, keeping pigeons, greyhounds, going to clubs, boating, dressmaking, lacemaking, waggon-making, as well as belonging to church groups,societies, and the Friends of the Village.
